messages.message: @Dylan @Jesika Haria - Is this Ok to send to prospects?
This was meant to be internal facing since we figured prospects may not care as much about specific apps. @Dylan what do you reckon?
@Dylan - I need a solution (similar to what he is doing in Tableau) and apps slide for leaders at JPMC.
this was a stop-gap solution if we needed to get something over immediately. we could just rebuild that slide that was used at HSBC as the backside of the onesheet
to confirm... the goal is to highlight breadth so they see what existing tech in their portfolio we can replace, correct?
That's part of it, the other goal is to provide them an overview of all our capabilities so they socialize our capabilities with key stakeholders so we dont have to do a demo every week for them
They are trying to find a home for us and need collateral to socialize our different capabilities because there is no public info and they are currently describing it as RPA on steroids
